entities.name: ministry witch
entities.description: The Ministry witch is described as checking their tickets at the entrance, indicating her role in managing access to the event.

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: Arthur is referred to by the Ministry witch, suggesting he is a member of the group and has been assigned seats.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as filing into the front seats with the Weasleys, indicating his presence at the event.

entities.name: weasley's party
entities.description: Weasley's party is mentioned as a group that is climbing the stairs and reaching the top of the staircase.

relationships.description: The Ministry witch assigns seats to Arthur, indicating a relationship between them based on their roles at the event.
Harry is described as filing into the front seats with the Weasleys, indicating a relationship between him and Weasley's party based on their shared attendance at the event.
